Package edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.minesweeper.gui

Class MineGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.minesweeper.gui.MineGUI

  • public class MineGUI
extends java.lang.Object
    MineGUI.java is a base that calls all GUI objects and handles tasks such as pausing the game, creating the GUI, making the escape key functional, and allowing for a new game.
    Version:
    2015/03/04 for lab07, cs56, W15
    Author:
    David Acevedo, Ryan Wiener
